timeline.message:
Refactor AppenderatorConfig to inherit from TuningConfig

* Unify identical APIs (remove duplicates)
* Rename rowFlushBoundary in HadoopTuningConfig to maxRowsInMemory to match TuningConfig API
* Move getMaxBytesInMemoryOrDefault() to TuningConfig (delete TuningConfig*s*)
* Added test coverage

timeline.bodyText: shortly explain what this is testing in the PR

timeline.message:
Move common configurations to TuningConfig

* Move common methods that are used in HadoopTuningConfig and in AppenderatorConfig to TuningConfig
* Rename rowFlushBoundary in HadoopTuningConfig to maxRowsInMemory to match TuningConfig API
